ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Code Red
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Dark Horde is after the fabled Cyclops Eye and the only thing that can stop them is Agent Red. She finds herself alone in the forests of the pacific northwest outnumbered and overmatched. Help from a familiar ally is on the way but will it arrive in time to stop the Horde and keep the Cyclops Eye from falling into their hands?
